results.name: Triangle read by rows: A249095(n,k) * 2^k, k = 0 .. 2*n+1.
comment: for n > 0: sum of row n = 7*5^(n-1), cf. A005055.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n = 0..125 of triangle, flattened
xref: Cf. A249095, A000079, A005408 (row lengths), A249308 (central terms), A000302 (right edge), A005055 (row sums, except for initial 1), A013609.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 14 2014
